text: Sopa de gato (in English: Cat soup) is a simple soup from southern Spain. It is served hot and is a suitable dish for the winter. Typical ingredients include water, bread, oil, garlic and salt.Neuman, Henry; Baretti, Giuseppe Marco Antonio (1837). Neuman and Baretti's Dictionary of the Spanish and English Languages: Spanish and English. Longman. p. 777. ==References== Category:Soups Category:Spanish food
title: Sopa de gato
